name: Social Media Image
description:
Cheat sheet on Social Media image sizes. All in one place!


The plugin contains presets for image sizes of social networks, which allows you to quickly begin directly to design development.


Social media:

1. VK;

2. Twitter;

3. YouTube;

4. Facebook;

5. Instagram;

6. OK;

7. Twitch.tv;

8. LinkedIn;

9. Dribbble;

10. Figma;

11. Pinterest;

12. Tumblr;

13. Soundcloud;


How to use:

- run the plugin;

- find the desired media;

- select creative;

- Done;) A frame for your design will appear on the canvas.


Found a bug or want to add image size? Write to: twitter.com/AndreslavKozlov
